name: John Doe
description: Software engineer with 5+ years of experience in full-stack development. Passionate about creating scalable web applications.
fullDescription: John is a seasoned software engineer specializing in React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. He has led multiple projects from conception to deployment and enjoys mentoring junior developers.

name: Jane Smith
description: UX/UI designer focused on creating intuitive and beautiful user experiences. Expert in design systems and user research.
fullDescription: Jane is a creative UX/UI designer with a strong background in user-centered design. She has worked with startups and Fortune 500 companies to create engaging digital experiences.

name: Michael Johnson
description: Data scientist and machine learning engineer. Specializes in predictive analytics and AI model development.
fullDescription: Michael is a data scientist with expertise in machine learning, deep learning, and statistical analysis. He has published research papers and built production ML systems.

name: Sarah Williams
description: Product manager with a track record of launching successful products. Strong in strategy and cross-functional collaboration.
fullDescription: Sarah is an experienced product manager who has successfully launched multiple products across different industries. She excels at bridging the gap between business and technology.

name: David Brown
description: DevOps engineer specializing in cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines. Expert in AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes.
fullDescription: David is a DevOps engineer with extensive experience in cloud infrastructure, automation, and containerization. He has architected scalable systems for high-traffic applications.

name: Emily Davis
description: Frontend developer passionate about React and modern web technologies. Loves creating pixel-perfect UIs.
fullDescription: Emily is a frontend developer with a keen eye for design and detail. She specializes in React, TypeScript, and modern CSS frameworks, creating beautiful and performant user interfaces.
